column5: The BEST of all worlds--All In One: * A quiet, serene and peaceful place to relax. * A fun place to cook, swim, watch movies and play games. * A quiet business atmosphere to work and convenient to business parks. * Minutes from a night life full of excitement! * Nearby parks, restaurants and the best shopping! * 10 minutes to North Dallas * Long term rental is possible - let's talk! * SPECIAL DISCOUNTS: Summer Internship (Minimum stay 1 mo.); Seniors over age 62, Veterans, Corporate Relo Clients
column8: West Plano Luxury Bedroom, Home & Oasis Pool!
